scripts.dev: npm run gen:lib && concurrently "npm run watch" "chokidar 'src/**/*.ts' -c 'npm run gen:lib'"
scripts.gen:lib:platform: node -e "const os = require('os'); if (os.platform() === 'darwin' || os.platform() === 'linux') { require('child_process').execSync('./lib-gen', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else if (os.platform() === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('lib-gen.exe', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build && npm run gen:lib
